Aston Zhang
  • Home
  • Papers
Twitter GitHub Email

Aston Zhang is a senior scientist at Amazon Web Services AI Research. He studies efficient and robust methods for machine learning and natural language processing, currently focusing on large language models. He received the ICLR Outstanding Paper Award (2021), the ACM Ubicomp Distinguished Paper Award (2018), and the ACM SenSys Best Paper Award Nomination (2017). His open-source textbook, Dive into Deep Learning, has been adopted worldwide. He obtained his Ph.D. in Computer Science from University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

Hi! I’m happy to connect and discuss. My team is hiring intern scientists at our Santa Clara office or other global offices. Just email me.

Books

  • A. Zhang, Z. C. Lipton, M. Li, and A. J. Smola
    Dive into Deep Learning
    Cambridge University Press, 2023
    • Adopted at 400 universities from 60 countries
    • Featured in the AWS re:Invent 2021 keynote by Dr. Swami Sivasubramanian
  • A. Zhang, M. Li, Z. C. Lipton, and A. J. Smola
    动手学深度学习
    人民邮电出版社, 2nd ed., 2023, 1st ed., 2019
    • Best seller of new books in “Computers and Internet” at the largest Chinese online bookstore

    SPT: Semi-Parametric Prompt Tuning for Multitask Prompted Learning
